00056                 {
00057                         for (j = 0; j < queue_size; j++)
00058                         {
00059                                 if ( j == i ) continue;
00060                                 ai = (epi_agent *) pq_next(pq, j);
00061                                 s = &g_epi_stages[ai->stage];
00062                                 //printf("a: %d, ai: %d, ln_multiplier: %f\n", a->id, ai->id, s->ln_multiplier);
00063                                 if (abs(s->ln_multiplier) > EPSILON)
00064                                 {
00065                                         // tw_geometric draws from uniform until the draw is greater than P.
00066                                         // tw_geometric then returns the number of draws.
00067                                         // For large P (which is 1.0 - multiplier) this could be very large.
00068                                         // Also note that tw_geometric always returns an integer of 1 or
00069                                         // greater.
00070                                         draw = tw_rand_unif(lp->id);
00071 
00072                                         draw = log(draw);
00073                                         draw /= g_epi_stages[a->stage].ln_multiplier;
00074 
00075                                         //draw = tw_rand_geometric(lp->id, (s->start_multiplier + s->stop_multiplier)/2);
00076                                         //state->stats->s_ndraws += draw;
00077                                         state->stats->s_nchecked++;
00078                                         //printf("SEIR agent %d, stage %d, agent %d, stage %d, draw: %g\n",
00079                                         //      a->id, a->stage, ai->id, ai->stage, draw);
00080                                         if (draw <= delta_t) //Make agent sick
00081                                         {
00082 #if EPI_DEBUG
00083                                                 printf("%7.3f, lp, %7d, agent_infect, , , , %7d, %5.3f, %5.2f\n",
00084                                                         tw_now(lp), (int) lp->id, a->id, delta_t, draw);
00085 #endif
00086                                                 a->stage = EPI_INCUBATING;
00087                                                 g_epi_ct[a->ct][0]--;
00088                                                 g_epi_ct[a->ct][1]++;
00089                                                 if (g_epi_position_f)
00090                                                         fprintf(g_epi_position_f, "%.3f,%d,%d,%d\n", tw_now(lp), a->id, (int) lp->id, a->stage);
00091 
00092                                                 sn = &g_epi_stages[a->stage];
00093                                                 a->ts_infected = tw_now(lp);
00094                                                 a->ts_stage_tran = tw_rand_unif(lp->id)*(sn->max_duration - sn->min_duration)
00095                                                                 + sn->min_duration + tw_now(lp);
00096                                                 a->ts_last_tran = tw_now(lp);
00097                                                 // collect statistics
00098                                                 state->stats->s_ninfected++;
00099                                                 break;
00100                                         }
00101 #if EPI_DEBUG
00102                                         else
00103                                         {
00104                                                 printf("%7.3f, lp, %7d, agent_not_infect, , , , %7d, %5.3f, %5.2f\n",
00105                                                         tw_now(lp), (int) lp->id, a->id, delta_t, draw);
00106                                         }
00107 #endif
00108                                 }
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111         }       
00112  
00113         //printf("SEIR compputed at %f ", state->last_event);
00114 }
